channel.title: A small problem with Shops? (317)
channel.description:
[size=12pt][font=arial][b]Hello all the wonderful people of the Moparscape Community.[/b]
I am having a small problem with my shops. I have created a shop that will exchange a 'Agility Arena Ticket' (Item ID: 2996) for 1000M and will sell for it back to you for 1000M.
But the problem is that if you have 3 tickets you can sell 1 and then get 1B, then sell another and get 2B but if you sell 3 it only goes to 2147M and I know that's Java's limit but I was wondering if a message could display in the message box that would read "You don't have enough space' or something like that. Even if you sell 10 AGT you will still only get 2147M maximum.
Is there a way to fix this problem so that players do not lose their huge amounts of cash?
Sorry if this is difficult to understand. I am happy to provide any relevant information and I will Rep++ to the person that can help me solve this :)
Notes: I have PKPlanet Source V3 which is a 317 Server[/font][/size]

item.title: A small problem with Shops? (317)
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Krajix, post:6, topic:535773”][quote]if(amount > 2){
amount = 2;
c.sendMessage(“You can only sell 2 of these at a time”);
}
This how you’d only limit 2 sales at a time.[/quote]

Sorry thanks for your help I appreciate it. But I do not have a ‘Sellitem.cfg’ or anything in my source files and I cannot find where I would add it in ‘Client.java’. I am stumped. :([/quote]
It’d go in your shophandlers sellitem method (Where your shophandler is I don’t know)

Read full topic

item.title: A small problem with Shops? (317)
item.dc:creator: @Krajix Krajix
item.description:
@Krajix wrote:

if(amount > 2){ amount = 2; c.sendMessage("You can only sell 2 of these at a time"); } This how you'd only limit 2 sales at a time.

Sorry thanks for your help I appreciate it. But I do not have a ‘Sellitem.cfg’ or anything in my source files and I cannot find where I would add it in ‘Client.java’. I am stumped.

Read full topic

item.title: A small problem with Shops? (317)
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

if(amount > 2){
amount = 2;
c.sendMessage(“You can only sell 2 of these at a time”);
}
This how you’d only limit 2 sales at a time.

Read full topic

item.title: A small problem with Shops? (317)
item.dc:creator: @ultimatepkvillage ultimatepkvillage
item.description:
@ultimatepkvillage wrote:

What sk8r said or make a 1b cash bag / lower ticket selling back to shop. And you can’t rep ++ they removed that feature along time ago.

Read full topic

item.title: A small problem with Shops? (317)
item.dc:creator: @Krajix Krajix
item.description:
@Krajix wrote:

Sure, in the sell item, just make a check for the item id and if the amount being sold is over 2, make it only sell 2 and send a message saying "You can only sell 2 tickets" and then make another check to see if the ticket value + the amount the player has in inventory is greater than 2147m, and if it is make it return a message saying your inventory is full.

Thank you for this, but I seem to be having trouble doing this. Would you be able to explain it in more detail or link me to something than can help? Sorry haha.

Read full topic

item.title: A small problem with Shops? (317)
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Sure, in the sell item, just make a check for the item id and if the amount being sold is over 2, make it only sell 2 and send a message saying “You can only sell 2 tickets” and then make another check to see if the ticket value + the amount the player has in inventory is greater than 2147m, and if it is make it return a message saying your inventory is full.

Read full topic

item.title: A small problem with Shops? (317)
item.dc:creator: @Krajix Krajix
item.description:
@Krajix wrote:

[size=12pt][font=arial]Hello all the wonderful people of the Moparscape Community.

I am having a small problem with my shops. I have created a shop that will exchange a ‘Agility Arena Ticket’ (Item ID: 2996) for 1000M and will sell for it back to you for 1000M.

But the problem is that if you have 3 tickets you can sell 1 and then get 1B, then sell another and get 2B but if you sell 3 it only goes to 2147M and I know that’s Java’s limit but I was wondering if a message could display in the message box that would read "You don’t have enough space’ or something like that. Even if you sell 10 AGT you will still only get 2147M maximum.

Is there a way to fix this problem so that players do not lose their huge amounts of cash?

Sorry if this is difficult to understand. I am happy to provide any relevant information and I will Rep++ to the person that can help me solve this

Notes: I have PKPlanet Source V3 which is a 317 Server[/font][/size]
